text: (loud river in Aymara) is a city in Chile. It is the capital of the province of Parinacota, in the region of Arica and Parinacota, in the north of Chile. The city was founded in December 30, 1927, and in 1979, the old town called Bel√©n was appended to Putre. Category:Cities in Chile Category:Communes of Chile Category:Arica y Parinacota Region
title: Putre
